images.description: Modern glass building against a bright sky, suitable for login page background
Clean workspace for empty states or dashboard placeholder

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for text.
Do NOT center align the app container.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic - no generic centered layouts.
Support German language word lengths (avoid fixed widths).
instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Smart-Knowledge-Nexus' with a focus on 'Clean Enterprise' aesthetics.
Use the provided colors to override default Shadcn/Tailwind values.
Ensure the PDF ingestion flow has a clear, step-by-step UI.
The Search Interface is the heart of the app - make it prominent and fast.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard overview.
All text inputs must have a clear focus state with the Brand Indigo color.
For the Tree Navigation, use a recursive component strategy.
